title: No egg, dairy free banana bread (conventional or bread machine)
ingredients: ['135g sugar (I use half brown, half caster)', '70g vegetable fat (StorkÂ® or similar)', '250g self-raising flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbinate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3 mashed ripe bananas', '4 to 5 tablespoons soya milk (or water) - optional', 'Optional', '1 handful raisins, nuts, chocolate chips or sultanas']
